name: Spectral Car Race: Speed Sport
description:
Get ready drivers for a racing adventure with this car racing game containing multiple race modes. Choose one of the multiple colors for your car and smash your opponents, jump and perform race stunts, win the racing championship and be a champion buggy racer. Put your tiny feet on race pedal and pump the race action towards victory.

OXO Games Studio does a marvellous job providing a fine addition to driving games, race games and fun games category. Multiple car colors & race modes increase the thrill of speed racing on race tracks, jumping over road obstacles like a professional stuntman doing vehicle tricks in a sports stadium. Enjoy being the speed champion of speed racing.

FEATURES:
• Action packed car racing adventure
• Pump speed into your car and achieve hard-earned victory
• A challenging series of race modes to master
• Multiple colors for your monster car
• Smooth and responsive car controls
• Amazing HD Graphics
• Free to play forever
• Racing music and sound effects
• No In-App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…

JOIN US ON SOCIAL NETWORKS:

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR CUSTOMERS:
